properties.description: Chattabox on Thursday is for Mums and pre school children. Tuesday: Coffestop@TCF - Free Tea, coffee, biscuits and toast will be served. Have a chat, do a jigsaw, make new friends, peruse the secondhand rail, or just relax. Need help? We are ready to listen and have information that maybe useful.
properties.title: Tanterton Christian Fellowship

properties.description: We cater for all ages. Everyone is welcome. We are a community arts centre, just a short distance from the bus station. You can find us opposite the job centre on Penny Street. We have two sessions a week, both of which are free and friendly and where you can get a brew, toast and a chat.
properties.title: The Bureau Centre for the Arts

properties.description: Don’t stay home in the cold, be warm & toasty! A warm welcome awaits with good coffee (and tea!) and plenty of toast! Our Connect Wednesday includes a craft group, and is followed by an optional 2 course lunch (£4) at 12:30
